data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 139 believers in Nanumea to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nanumea, Tuvalu
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Nanumea to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict the believers in Nanumea, Tuvalu to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Jesus, purify the 139 believers in the state of Nanumea to not just be hearers, but doers of your Word.
data.verse: Blessed is the one who reads aloud the words of this prophecy, and blessed are those who hear it and take to heart what is written in it, because the time is near.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Nanumea, Tuvalu to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Nanumea, Tuvalu into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Father, if there is even one of the 139 believers in Nanumea, Tuvalu who does not have a Bible, please provide them one today.
